terms.title: Website Terms and Conditions
terms.paragraph1: This website is a demonstration and experimental project created solely for educational and demonstration purposes. It does not provide any commercial services and does not generate revenue.
terms.paragraph2: By using this website, the user acknowledges that all information and functionalities are provided "as is", without any guarantees regarding their performance.
terms.paragraph3: The author assumes no responsibility for any damages resulting from the use of this website.
terms.paragraph4: Users' personal data is processed solely for the purposes necessary for the operation of the website and is not shared with third parties.
terms.paragraph5: The user confirms that they understand the nature of the project and agrees to use the service in accordance with its intended purpose.
terms.paragraph6: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the project author.
terms.decline: I Do Not Accept / Close Terms
